content: Hi all, I'm new here and want to get more experience working on LLVM and Rust. I don't know what I want to work on :smile: and am open to working on anything tractable/beginner friendly that can move the needle even the tiniest bit. Looking for suggestions.

@Kshitij Something really easy to start with would be too look at some https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AA-LLVM+label%3AE-needs-test issues. Those are usually already fixed, but need a test (usually an IR codegen test) on the rust side.
